RECORD:
Rare disease patients have complex clinical representations. Patients with Febrile Seizures, Familial, 4 present clinical features that include febrile seizures, developmental delay, and epilepsy. The disease is caused by mutations affecting the gene represented in this entry.

Febrile Seizures, Familial, 4 is a rare disease with a prevalence of less than 1 per million population.
